user.About: Hello, I'm Vivek. An undergrad computer science major from india. From my passion I love to build new things and I always try to implement my creativity in my projects and all of my creations. I love to learn about new technologies like Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Deep Learning and TensorFlow or PyTorch etc. Also since , from childhood exploring the universe and cosmos and knowing even more about my world makes me even more alive. And besides of this I am also quite good at frontend technologies like React.Js and Figma etc.

RandomAboutText: Things I have Built (I am also maintaining themðŸ˜‘)

Things like 'Completed Projects' doesn't exsist in my life as I got an idea about a project and I start working on them. There's always something there which I find that can be improved. So every project is ongoing.

exp1.description: Participated in HacktoberFest 2023 and contributed to open source projects and made 4 pull requests accepted and merged.

exp2.description: As a Student Ambassador, I organised workshops in my community with Lets Upgrade support, shared tech experiences and promoted free resources offered by Lets Upgrade

project1.name: HIRO
project1.description: Your Personal Healthcare Companion :D.It's a healthcare chatbot that uses Naive Bayes , Decision Tree Classifier and Random Forest Classifier to predict the disease by extracting symptoms from the user's prompt

project2.name: PANDA
project2.description: Paradigm based Artificial Neural Dailog Agent(PANDA) medium sized LSTM language model. It's a text generation LM built using Keras and LSTM (Long Short Term Memory) neural network which is designed to generate the next sequence of text based on a given prompt.

project3.name: XDEA
project3.description: A Retrieval based Machine Learning Bot which is capable of learning new responses over the time.The Machine Learning algorithim allow the bot to store and retrive new responses.

project4.name: LearnIT
project4.description: An open source free of cost learning platform for all the computer science students pursuing their diplomas.

project5.name: Baymax
project5.description: As it's name suggests, you all time fav buddy
project5.tech_stack: Deep learning, NLP, Web Automation, Speech Recognition

project6.name: Colab Web Server
project6.description: A simple tool to use Google Colab as backend to host web apps. This project includes a flask web app that runs on google colab and a python scripts that sends your response to endpoint and fetches the response from flask app.
project6.tech_stack: Cloud Computing, Web APIs, Python, Jupyter

project7.name: LECTURE2NOTES
project7.description: It is a simple command-line python app that can record the notes or speaked lessons of teacher and convert them into Pdf Notes.
